name: Monstrocity
description:
In the year 20XX, humanity has just recovered from a nuclear apocalypse. Everyone lives under a new sustainable economy model, with 100% clean renewable energy, no poverty or crime, and no corruption.

This is unnaceptable for the underground monster society, who feeds on chaos and human fear, so they have inbreed during a hundred generations to give birth to YOU, the ultimate-teenage-mutant-monster. It is your duty to destroy civilization for once and return mankind to the good old apocalypse age.

Bring the caos to Monstrocity!

Made in 48h for LD33
